titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Global Engagement Center of the Department of State.
A bill to authorize appropriations for the Global Engagement Center of the Department of State.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the appropriation of $150 million in FY2022 for the Global Engagement Center of the Department of State to counter foreign state and non-state sponsored propaganda and disinformation.
